title: Hello World
description: Write a programme to print Hello World
contentHtml:
Write a program to print Hello World

Hello World !!!

// Write a program to print Hello World
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <stdio.h>

int main(void)
{
    // the print statement prints hello world
    printf("Hello World !!!\n");
    return 0;
}


// Write a program to print Hello World
using System;

namespace HelloConsoleApp
{
    class HelloWorld
    {
        public static void Main()
        {
            Console.WriteLine("Hello World !!!");
        }
    }
}


// Write a program to print Hello World
#include <iostream>

int main()
{
  std::cout << "Hello World !!!\n";
  return 0;
}


// Write a program to print Hello World

console.log("Hello World !!!");


# Write a program to print Hello World
# It's easy as that, the print function output what's inside the quotes

print("Hello World!")


// Write a program to print Hello World

public class HelloWorld {

  public static void main(String args[]) {
    System.out.println("Hello World !!!");
  }
}


// Write a programme to print Hello World
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	fmt.Println("Hello World !!!")
}
